column5: Our home is ideally for Sea World/Lackland AFB visitors but any other visitor is also welcome, its a comfy 2 story house with 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 2 living areas and entertainment set. The home has a large wooden deck with a BBQ Pit and Trampoline! Conveniently located 7 minutes from Sea world , 8 minutes from Lackland AFB, 20 minutes to The Rim and Six Flags, 20 minutes from Downtown San Antonio.
